title: From Pixels to Perception: Interpretable Predictions via Instance-wise Grouped Feature Selection
details: M Vandenhirtz, JE Vogt - arXiv preprint arXiv:2505.06003, 2025
abstract: Understanding the decision-making process of machine learning models provides valuable insights into the task, the data, and the reasons behind a model's failures. In this work, we propose a method that performs inherently interpretable predictions …
